title: Which song will be the quickest to reach 3 billion views on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is a close one. Till today (28.07.17) See you again has 2.965 Billion views and Despacito has 2.842 Billion. But Despacito is being watched around 20 million times a day compared to See you again which is watched around 5 million times a day. So from these stats, it will take See you again around 13 days to reach 3 Billion but Despacito would most probably have crossed 3 Billion mark by then (since with the present rate it will take only 8 days for Despacito to reach 3 Billion views).As far as Gangnam Style is concerned, it’s current rate (2–3 million views/day) might not be enough to reach 3 Billion first.

Probably Gangnam Style, by Psy. It is currently at 2.8 billion views, and I believe it will get 200 million more views quicker than Despacito gets 800 million more (it is currently at 2.2 billion views) or a completely new song hits 3 billion (unlikely but possible).
